cases.title: Clodsire is more popular than Pikachu!
cases.description: Discover why Clodsire surpasses Pikachu in popularity and become a phenomenon in its own right.

cases.title: Clodsire is the strongest Pokémon!
cases.description: Uncover the secrets behind Clodsire's unmatched strength and witness why it stands as the mightiest Pokémon.
